topic: Governments should ban all single-use plastics immediately, regardless of economic impact. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
essayText:
Plastic very bad for earth but ban all plastic now not good idea. I disagree.

Plastic killing animal in sea. Fish eat plastic die. Bird also eat plastic. Very sad. We need stop use so much plastic.

But if ban all plastic now big problem happen. Many people no job. Factory close. No money for family. Very difficult time.

Hospital need plastic thing. If no plastic maybe people die. Food also need plastic or become bad.

We dont have good thing to replace plastic yet. Paper also not good need tree. 

Better to stop plastic slow slow. First stop plastic bag. Then other thing. Give time for people find new way.

So plastic bad but cannot stop immediate. Need time for change. Both environment and economy important.
strengths: Shows basic understanding of the issue
weaknesses: Major grammatical errors in every sentence
